title: Local connection properties not saved when user has read only access to database
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
From #1348. Local connection properties (such as folder expansion states) are not saved when the user does not have write access to the database. We should be able to detect and handle this situation and still save local-only properties, even though database values won't be saved.

## Expected Behavior
Local connection properties should still be saved.

## Current Behavior
Local connection properties are not saved.
